name: Gravity Runner (itch) (Johanides)
description:
Gravity Runner is infinite-runner with six tracks aligned to circle, each with different direction of gravity.

Tracks are made of consequent tiles and you can change track (gravity) only once per tile.

You can also find pick-ups

  • Coins - to buy upgrades
  • Magnets - to collect coins from multiple tracks
    • Can be upgraded to last longer
  • Locks - that seals your view
    • Can be upgraded to expire sooner
